document_data.name: ''One Sage's Wyrmbook''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''One Sage's Wyrmbook''''' was a book on [[dragon]]s by the sage [[Maskalandur Narlur]] of the city-state of [[Ormpur]] on the edge of [[Lapaliiya]] in [[southwest Faer√ªn]], published in the [[1369 DR|Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR]]. It told of notable dragons like the [[song dragon]] [[Taraunramorlamurla]] who dwelled in [[Waterdeep]].
{{quote|Such a one I've not seen before, nor expect her like again. Calm, disinterested in great wealth or vainglory, above all fair and principled. She hardly seems a dragon at all!|Excerpt from ''One Sage's Wyrmbook''.}}
